response.original_title: Care That Comes from the Heart
response.overview: After years of living abroad, Luisa comes home to surprising news: an engagement to the wealthy bachelor Diego, much to the dismay of her secret lover, the farm boy Anton. Can love keep them safe when everything else falls apart?  Philippine Airlines latest inflight safety video is a full-blown telenovela—packed with drama, heated confrontations, heartbreaking tears—designed to keep you watching until the very end.
response.title: Care That Comes from the Heart
